thread.title: NASCAR's Tony Stewart will retire from Cup racing after '16
thread.title_full: NASCAR's Tony Stewart will retire from Cup racing after '16

title: NASCAR's Tony Stewart will retire from Cup racing after '16
text:
> Top News NASCAR's Tony Stewart will retire from Cup racing after '16 Tony Stewart listens to a question during a news conference to announce his retirement from driving NASCAR Sprint Cup series racing after the 2016 season at Stewart-Haas Racing's headquarters in Kannapolis, N.C., Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015. (AP Photo/Chuck Burton) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
